divs: sighting detailsmy son was in the backyard and said come, so i ran out and there were silver shiny objects seemed to be falling from the sky. then i realized they were moving sideways and came all together then after an hour they all seemed to disappear. i wanted to call the tv news. i didnt have a camera. my son, 24 said maybe a sattlelight exploded and they were fragments. the best way i can explain would be how foil has two side, one shiny and one not so shiny. as they slowly moved they went from shiny to not so shiny. they had a orb of light around them. like stars out in broad daylight! i called my husband at work and told him, i had to tell someone! and went on the net to see who else saw this today and ran across your web site. i am fifty and have never seen anything this cool in my whole life. i do not know if it was government or what. something crazy is going on, like right out of a movie! i wanted them to be something falling so i could get closer and see what they were. they were not moving fast....seemed to hover and not care if we saw them! i just wonder if anyone else in chandler happened to be looking up at this time and noticed what we saw? we have not been able to sleep, my husband son and i for a couple of weeks and i do allot of spiritual stuff with the bible and the end times.....so i know kinda what is going on in the world with all the sounds and stuff, but this was crazy! thank you for letting me share this weird experience. [name deleted\cms\tg]
Summary: looked like foil falling from the sky moved slowly about 30 of them or more some closer than others they disapeared slowly after an hour they where all gone they wanted us to see them like they were putting on a show strangest thing i have ever seen!
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There was one other sighting in Chandler on or around March 26th 2012
